summary: An expedition seeking to bring Jane back to civilization, and Tarzan into captivity, gets more than it's bargained for.
cast: Johnny Weissmuller|Maureen O'Sullivan|John Buckler|Benita Hume|William Henry|Herbert Mundin|E.E. Clive|Darby Jones|Cheetah|Everett Brown|Johnny Eck|Monte Montague
director: Directors: Richard Thorpe, John Farrow (uncredited) | 3 more credits »
title: La fuga de Tarzán
